data.message: Please pick me, my sister is literally in love with ed, she means so much to me and does so much for me and I want to surprise her with these tickets, she works so hard and never expects anything ever and it will literally make her the happiest girl in the world, she cried for about three days when she couldn't get Ed sheeran tickets for his last concert and I can't think of anything better to give to my best friend and soul mate (not in a romantic way) she really deserves it. So please people who pick the winners, please pick me and allow me to make my sister the happiest girl in the universe
